odd.head: Publication, Distribution, Etc.
odd.p: Royal Oak, Mich. : American Arab Message, [200-]

odd.head: Formatted Contents Note
odd.p: Disc [1]. A Muslim's character (4 min.) -- Ordering information (5 min.) -- Our 1st century (31 min.) -- Faith in action : first Gulf War, February 2, 1991 / Imam Al Haj Muhammad A.H. Karoub (10 min.) -- America's 1st mosque (3 min.). Disc [2]. Salat : introduction to prayer -- Hijab : an act of faith -- 99 names of Allah.
